faq.question: How long does installation take?
faq.answer: Installation typically takes 2-8 hours depending on the complexity of your system. We'll provide a time estimate during your consultation.

faq.question: Do you offer financing options?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment plans and financing options. Contact us to discuss what works best for your budget.

faq.question: What areas do you serve?
faq.answer: We serve the local metropolitan area. Contact us to confirm service availability in your specific location.

faq.question: Can you integrate with existing systems?
faq.answer: Yes, we can often integrate new security systems with your existing smart home or business systems. We'll assess compatibility during consultation.

faq.question: Are you licensed and insured?
faq.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed security installers, insured and bonded. Our technicians are network certified and undergo continuous training.

faq.question: Do you provide emergency support?
faq.answer: We offer 24/7 technical support for existing customers. For emergencies, our support team is available around the clock.

faq.question: Is the consultation free?
faq.answer: Yes! We provide completely free consultations and estimates. No obligation, no hidden fees.

faq.question: Do you offer maintenance services?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide ongoing maintenance services and support plans to keep your security system running optimally.

faq.question: Can I control my system from my phone?
faq.answer: Absolutely! All our systems include mobile app access for remote monitoring and control from anywhere.

faq.question: Can I expand my system later?
faq.answer: Yes, our systems are designed to be scalable. You can easily add more cameras or components as your needs grow.
